column3: User Query
column4: Chatbot Response

column3: Where is the PIA check-in counter?
column4: PIA check-in counters are located in Row C near Gate 4 at Islamabad Airport.

column3: Which row is the Serene Air check-in desk in?
column4: Serene Air check-in desks are in Row B, counters 8–12 at Islamabad Airport.

column3: What time does check-in start for flight PK301?
column4: Check-in for PK301 opens 3 hours before departure at Islamabad Airport.

column3: Can I check in my luggage 3 hours before the flight?
column4: Yes,international check-in opens 3 hours early; domestic opens 2 hours early.

column3: How much baggage is allowed for Airblue?
column4: Airblue allows 20 kg for checked baggage and 7 kg hand-carry.

column3: Where can I get a boarding pass for PK308?
column4: Boarding passes are issued at the PIA counters in Row C at Islamabad Airport.

column3: Do I need to print my boarding pass or is mobile OK?
column4: A mobile boarding pass is accepted at Islamabad Airport; printing is optional.

column3: Where do I drop my luggage after online check-in?
column4: Go to your airlines baggage-drop counter marked Online Check-In.

column3: My flight is to Dubai — which counter should I go to?
column4: For Dubai flights proceed to the international check-in area Row A.

column3: Can you tell me the check-in counter number for Qatar Airways?
column4: Qatar Airways counters are at Row A counters 1–6 in the departure hall.

column3: Is the check-in area before or after security check?
column4: The check-in area is before the main security checkpoint.

column3: What documents are needed for check-in at Islamabad Airport?
column4: You will need your CNIC or passport, ticket and vaccination certificate if required.

column3: Is there a separate counter for business class?
column4: Yes, most airlines have dedicated business-class counters next to regular ones.

column3: Where do I go for excess baggage payment?
column4: Pay at your airlines counter or the excess baggage desk near Row D.

column3: How early should I arrive for an international flight?
column4: Arrive at least 3 hours before departure for international flights.

column3: What time does check-in close for domestic flights?
column4: Domestic check-in closes 45 minutes before flight time.

column3: Is there a self-check-in kiosk at Islamabad Airport?
column4: Yes,self-check-in kiosks are available near the entrance of Departure Hall B.

column3: Where can I find the baggage-wrapping service?
column4: Baggage wrapping is available beside Gate 3 in the departure hall.

column3: Which side is the PIA counter in the departure hall?
column4: PIA counters are on the left side of the departure hall.

column3: I can’t find my airline’s check-in counter — can you help?
column4: Please check the flight information screen; it shows airline counter locations.

column3: Where can I print my boarding pass at the airport?
column4: Printing kiosks are beside the airline counters and near the information desk.

column3: What is the check-in counter number for Fly Jinnah?
column4: Fly Jinnah uses counters 10–14 in Row C at Islamabad Airport.

column3: Do you know if Serene Air check-in is open right now?
column4: Serene Air check-in opens 2 hours before departure and closes 45 minutes before.

column3: I have connecting flights — can I check in luggage till final destination?
column4: Yes,for international connections, luggage is tagged till your final city.

column3: Is there a family check-in counter?
column4: Yes,families with children can use the priority lane beside Counter 5.

column3: Can I use the fast-track check-in service?
column4: Fast-track is available for business-class and premium passengers only.

column3: Which counter handles special-assistance passengers?
column4: Counter 1 is dedicated for passengers needing special assistance.

column3: Where can I check in my sports equipment?
column4: Sports equipment can be checked at the oversize baggage counter near Row D.

column3: Can I check in more than one bag?
column4: Yes,as long as the total weight doesn’t exceed your airlines baggage limit.

column3: How much weight is allowed in hand-carry?
column4: Standard hand-carry allowance is 7 kg confirm with your airline.

column3: Which gate should I go to after check-in?
column4: Your gate number will be printed on your boarding pass.

column3: Do I need to show my vaccination certificate during check-in?
column4: Some destinations require it; carry a printed or digital copy just in case.

column3: Where can I find trolley service for luggage?
column4: Trolleys are available at every entrance and near airline counters.

column3: I can't find my airline on the departure screen — what should I do?
column4: Visit the information desk or ask airline staff at the help counter.

column3: Is the check-in counter for PK302 near Gate 2 or 3?
column4: The check-in for PK302 is close to Gate 3 in the departure area.

column3: Can I check in without a printout of my ticket?
column4: Yes,you can show the e-ticket on your phone or CNIC at the counter.

column3: Is there a separate line for online check-in passengers?
column4: Yes,look for signs marked Online Check-In or Baggage Drop.

column3: I have fragile items — can I get a fragile tag at check-in?
column4: Yes,inform the counter agent they will attach a Fragile label.

column3: Where is the luggage drop for Serene Air?
column4: Serene Air baggage-drop is beside counters 9–10 in Row B.

column3: What are the check-in timings for early morning flights?
column4: Check-in opens at least 2 hours before scheduled departure.

column3: Can I check in my power bank or electronics?
column4: Power banks and electronics must go in hand-carry not checked luggage.

column3: Where do I weigh my luggage before check-in?
column4: Scales are placed near each airline counter and at baggage wrapping stations.

column3: I lost my e-ticket — can I still check in?
column4: Yes,show your CNIC and flight details; airline staff can retrieve your booking.

column3: Which terminal handles PIA domestic flights?
column4: PIA domestic flights operate from Terminal 1 (Departure Hall C).

column3: Can I check in for my return flight also?
column4: Normally check-in is only for the current flight; return check-in is not available.

column3: Where is the counter for international check-in?
column4: International counters are located in Row A near immigration entry.

column3: How long is the average check-in time right now?
column4: It usually takes 15–25 minutes depending on passenger load.

column3: Can I check in my baby stroller?
column4: Yes,it can be tagged at check-in and handed over at the boarding gate.

column3: Are check-in counters open 24 hours?
column4: Only for certain airlines; others open 3 hours before scheduled flights.

column3: How do I know which row my airline’s counter is in?
column4: Flight screens in the hall show counter rows and airline logos for easy guidance.
